**Required Qualifications:**

**Application Deadline:** 29 January 2025

---

**Job Title:** AI Engineer  
**Department:** Technology  

**Job Description:**  
Descon is seeking a highly skilled AI Engineer to join our innovative technology team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in artificial intelligence and machine learning, with a passion for developing cutting-edge AI solutions. This role involves designing, implementing, and optimizing AI models to solve complex problems and enhance our business operations.

**Key Responsibilities:**  
- Design and develop AI models and algorithms to address business challenges.  
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into existing systems and processes.  
- Optimize and fine-tune algorithms for improved performance, scalability, and efficiency.  
- Conduct thorough data analysis to support model development and deployment.  
- Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning technologies.  
- Document AI models and processes for knowledge sharing and future reference.  

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**  
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field.  
- Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, with experience in machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.  
- Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, and statistical analysis.  
- Experience with cloud platforms and model deployment tools.  
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.  
- Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with team members and stakeholders.  

**Preferred Certifications:**  
- Certified AI Engineer or equivalent certification is a plus.  

**Application Deadline:** 24 January 2025  

---

**Job Title: Mid-Level Brand Strategist**

**Location:** [Your Location]

**Company:** DESCON

**Application Deadline:** 28 March 2025

**About DESCON:**
DESCON is a leading engineering company committed to innovation and excellence. We are seeking a talented Brand Strategist to join our team and help shape the future of our brand in the engineering sector.

**Job Description:**
As a Mid-Level Brand Strategist at DESCON, you will play a pivotal role in developing and executing brand strategies that resonate with our target audience. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure brand consistency and drive brand growth.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Develop and implement comprehensive brand strategies that align with DESCON's goals and objectives.
- Conduct market research to identify trends, insights, and opportunities within the engineering sector.
- Collaborate with marketing, design, and product teams to ensure brand consistency across all channels.
- Analyze brand performance metrics and provide actionable insights to optimize brand positioning.
- Manage brand communication and ensure alignment with DESCON's values and mission.
- Lead branding initiatives and campaigns to enhance brand awareness and loyalty.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- 3-7 years of experience in branding, with a strong understanding of the engineering sector.
- Proven track record of developing successful brand strategies.
- Excellent communication and presentation skills.
- Proficiency in brand management software and tools.
- A recognized certification in brand management and strategy.
- Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data to drive decision-making.

**Preferred Skills:**

- Experience with digital marketing and social media strategies.
- Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities.

**Why Join DESCON?**

- Opportunity to work with a dynamic and innovative team.
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Career growth and development opportunities.

**Job Title: Electrical Engineer**

**Location:** DESCON

**Application Deadline:** February 2, 2025

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a skilled and experienced Electrical Engineer to join our team in the power sector. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in electrical engineering with a focus on power systems, and a proven track record of at least 5 years in the industry. This role requires a professional who is adept at designing, implementing, and maintaining electrical systems to ensure efficient and reliable power distribution.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Design and develop electrical systems and components for power distribution and transmission.
- Conduct site inspections and assessments to ensure compliance with industry standards and safety regulations.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate electrical systems into larger projects.
- Troubleshoot and resolve electrical issues to maintain system reliability and performance.
- Prepare technical reports and documentation for project planning and execution.
- Stay updated with the latest advancements in electrical engineering and power systems.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field.
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in the power sector.
- Strong knowledge of electrical design software and tools.
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Professional Engineer (PE) license is preferred.

**Software Proficiency:**

- AutoCAD Electrical
- ETAP or similar power system analysis software

**Certifications:**

- Professional Engineer (PE) license (preferred)

**Job Title: Hardware Technician**

**Location:** [Your Location]

**Company:** DESCON

**Application Deadline:** March 31, 2025

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a skilled and dedicated Hardware Technician to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in computer hardware, with a focus on maintaining and troubleshooting mid-level systems. This role requires a proactive individual who can work independently and collaboratively to ensure the smooth operation of our hardware infrastructure.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Install, configure, and maintain computer hardware components and systems.
- Diagnose and resolve hardware issues, ensuring minimal downtime.
- Perform regular maintenance and upgrades to hardware systems.
- Collaborate with IT team members to support network and software needs.
- Document hardware configurations and maintenance activities.
- Provide technical support and guidance to end-users.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Mid-level experience in computer hardware maintenance and troubleshooting.
- CompTIA A+ certification is required.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience with hardware inventory management.
- Familiarity with network and software troubleshooting.

**Job Title: Hotel Manager**

**Location: DESCON Luxury Hotel**

**Application Deadline: March 31, 2025**

**Company Overview:**
DESCON is a leading name in the luxury hospitality industry, renowned for our exceptional service and exquisite guest experiences. We are seeking a dedicated and experienced Hotel Manager to join our team and uphold our standards of excellence.

**Job Description:**
As a Hotel Manager at DESCON Luxury Hotel, you will oversee the daily operations of our prestigious establishment, ensuring the highest level of guest satisfaction and operational efficiency. You will lead a team of professionals, manage resources, and implement strategies to enhance our services.

**Key Responsibilities:**
- Oversee all aspects of hotel operations, including guest services, housekeeping, and maintenance.
- Ensure compliance with health, safety, and luxury standards.
- Manage budgets, financial plans, and control expenditures.
- Lead, train, and motivate staff to deliver exceptional service.
- Develop and implement marketing strategies to increase occupancy and revenue.
- Handle guest inquiries, complaints, and feedback with professionalism.
- Maintain strong relationships with vendors, partners, and stakeholders.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**
- Mid-level experience in hotel management, preferably in a luxury setting.
- Certified Hotel Administrator (CHA) certification is required.
- Strong leadership and team management skills.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Proficient in hotel management software and financial systems.
- Ability to work under pressure and resolve conflicts effectively.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Management or a related field.
- Experience in luxury hotel operations and guest services.

- Strong understanding of CI/CD tools and practices.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Preferred certifications: AWS Certified DevOps Engineer, Microsoft Certified: Azure DevOps Engineer Expert.

**Why Join DESCON?**

- Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies in a collaborative environment.
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Professional growth and development opportunities.

**Job Title: Assistant Project Manager - IT**

**Location:** DESCON

**Job Type:** Full-Time

**Application Deadline:** February 25, 2025

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a dedicated and skilled Assistant Project Manager to join our IT team. The ideal candidate will support project management activities, ensuring the successful delivery of IT projects using Agile/Scrum methodologies. This mid-level role requires a proactive individual with strong organizational and communication skills.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Assist in planning, executing, and closing IT projects, ensuring alignment with company goals and objectives.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project scope, goals, and deliverables.
- Monitor project progress and provide regular updates to stakeholders.
- Facilitate Agile/Scrum ceremonies, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives.
- Identify and mitigate project risks and issues.
- Support the Project Manager in resource allocation and budget management.
- Maintain project documentation and ensure compliance with company standards.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Software Engineering, or a related field.
- Proven experience in project management within the IT industry.
- Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies and tools.
- Strong organizational and multitasking skills.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Problem-solving mindset with attention to detail.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) or Project Management Professional (PMP) certification is a plus.

**Software Proficiency:**

- Experience with project management tools such as Jira, Trello, or Microsoft Project.

**Job Title: Chemical Engineer (Mid-Level)**  
**Location: DESCON Oil Refinery**  
**Application Deadline: 8 February 2025**

**Company Overview:**  
DESCON is a leading company in the oil refining industry, committed to innovation, safety, and sustainability. We are seeking a skilled Chemical Engineer to join our team and contribute to our mission of delivering high-quality products while maintaining the highest safety standards.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Design, develop, and optimize chemical processes within the oil refinery to enhance efficiency and safety.
- Ensure compliance with OSHA regulations and other industry standards.
- Conduct research and implement new technologies to improve refinery operations.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve process-related issues.
- Prepare technical reports and documentation for process improvements and safety audits.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Master's degree in Chemical Engineering or a related field.
- Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in a chemical engineering role within the oil refinery industry.
- Strong knowledge of OSHA regulations and safety practices.
- Proficiency in process simulation software such as Aspen HYSYS or ChemCAD.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Strong communication and teamwork abilities.

**Preferred Certifications:**

- Professional Engineer (PE) license is a plus.
- Certification in Process Safety Management (PSM) is advantageous.

**Job Title: Construction Manager - Infrastructure**

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a skilled and experienced mid-level Construction Manager to oversee our infrastructure projects. **Key Responsibilities:**

- Strong knowledge of construction processes, materials, and legal regulations.
- Excellent leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills.
- Proficiency in project management software and tools.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience with large-scale infrastructure projects.
- Familiarity with local building codes and regulations.

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a talented and creative UI Designer to join our dynamic team, focusing on healthcare software and e-commerce projects. The ideal candidate will have a strong eye for design, a passion for creating intuitive user experiences, and the ability to translate complex requirements into user-friendly interfaces.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Implement responsive design principles using tools like Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS to ensure optimal performance across various devices.
- Conduct user research and usability testing to gather feedback and iterate on design solutions.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Proven experience in UI design, preferably within the healthcare software or e-commerce industry.
- Proficiency in Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, InVision, and Zeplin.
- Strong understanding of responsive design principles and experience with Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
- A portfolio showcasing previous UI design projects and demonstrating a strong design aesthetic.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience with user research and usability testing.
- Knowledge of accessibility standards and best practices in UI design.

**Job Title: Database Administrator (Mid-Level)**  
**Location: Lahore**  
**Application Deadline: 20 March 2025**

**Company Overview:**  
DESCON is a leading company committed to delivering innovative solutions and services. We are seeking a skilled Database Administrator to join our dynamic team in Lahore.

**Job Description:**  
As a Database Administrator at DESCON, you will be responsible for managing and maintaining our SQL Server databases to ensure optimal performance, security, and availability. You will work closely with our IT team to support database operations and contribute to the development of database solutions.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Manage and maintain SQL Server databases, ensuring high availability and performance.
- Perform regular database backups, recovery, and security measures.
- Monitor database performance and implement changes to optimize efficiency.
- Collaborate with developers to design and implement database solutions.
- Troubleshoot and resolve database-related issues.
- Ensure compliance with data protection regulations and company policies.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
- 3-5 years of experience as a Database Administrator, with a focus on SQL Server.
- Strong knowledge of database management, backup, recovery, and security.
- Proficiency in SQL and performance tuning.
- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
- Relevant certifications such as Microsoft Certified: Azure Database Administrator Associate are a plus.

**Benefits:**

- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Opportunities for professional growth and development.
- Collaborative and innovative work environment.

**Job Title: Junior DevOps Engineer**

**Location:** Lahore, Pakistan

**Company:** DESCON

**Salary Range:** PKR 80,000 - 120,000

**Application Deadline:** 04 February 2025

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Junior DevOps Engineer to join our team, focusing on industrial engineering projects. This entry-level position is ideal for individuals with a passion for technology and a desire to grow their skills in a dynamic environment.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support the deployment and management of applications.
- Assist in the implementation and maintenance of CI/CD pipelines using tools such as Jenkins or GitLab CI.
- Manage and monitor cloud infrastructure on AWS, ensuring high availability and scalability.
- Work with Docker and Kubernetes to containerize applications and manage orchestration.
- Troubleshoot and resolve issues in development, test, and production environments.
- Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to peers.
- Document processes and procedures to ensure knowledge sharing and continuity.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
- Familiarity with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD tools.
- Basic understanding of Linux/Unix systems and networking concepts.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
- Eagerness to learn and adapt to new technologies and methodologies.

**Preferred Certifications:**

- AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner or AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate.
- Docker Certified Associate.

Join DESCON and be part of a team that values innovation and continuous improvement. We look forward to your application!

**Job Title: Java Developer**

**Location:** Lahore

**Company:** DESCON

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a skilled and motivated Mid-Level Java Developer to join our dynamic team in Lahore, focusing on hospital management systems. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Java development, with expertise in Spring Boot, Hibernate, REST APIs, PostgreSQL, and Microservices. This role requires a proactive individual who can contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of robust healthcare solutions.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Develop, test, and maintain Java-based applications for hospital management systems.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.
- Utilize Spring Boot and Hibernate frameworks to enhance application performance.
- Design and implement RESTful APIs for seamless integration with other systems.
- Work with PostgreSQL databases to ensure data integrity and security.
- Develop and manage microservices architecture to support scalable applications.
- Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues in a timely manner.
- Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
- Java certification is preferred.
- Proven experience in Java development, particularly in Spring Boot and Hibernate.
- Strong understanding of REST APIs and Microservices architecture.
- Proficiency in PostgreSQL and database management.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Strong communication and teamwork abilities.

**Application Deadline:** 04 February 2025

**Job Title: Senior AI Engineer**

**Location:** Dubai

**Company:** DESCON

**Salary Range:** $100,000 annually

**Application Deadline:** 18 February 2025

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior AI Engineer to join our dynamic team in Dubai. As a Senior AI Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in developing and implementing cutting-edge Generative AI solutions that drive innovation and efficiency across our projects.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Lead the design, development, and deployment of advanced AI models and algorithms.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into existing systems and processes.
- Conduct research and stay updated on the latest AI trends and technologies to ensure DESCON remains at the forefront of AI innovation.
- Mentor and guide junior AI engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
- Ensure compliance with relevant regulatory and industry standards in all AI projects.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence or a related field.
- Proven experience in developing and deploying AI models, with a focus on Generative AI.
- Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, R, or Java.
- Experience with AI frameworks and tools such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Keras.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
- Strong communication and leadership skills.

**Preferred Certifications:**

- Certification in AI or Machine Learning from a recognized institution.

Join DESCON and be part of a team that is shaping the future of AI technology. Apply now and contribute to groundbreaking projects in a vibrant and innovative environment.

**Job Title: ServiceNow Developer**

**Location:** Lahore

**Salary Range:** PKR 250,000 - 340,000

**Application Deadline:** 27 March

**Company:** DESCON

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a skilled and motivated mid-level ServiceNow Developer to join our team in Lahore. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in integrating third-party APIs and hold relevant app development certifications. This role involves working closely with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement ServiceNow solutions that meet our business needs.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Develop and customize ServiceNow applications and services.
- Integrate ServiceNow with third-party APIs to enhance functionality.
- Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
- Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to ServiceNow applications.
- Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices.
- Provide technical support and guidance to end-users and team members.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Proven experience as a ServiceNow Developer, preferably in an integration-focused role.
- Relevant app development certifications.
- Strong knowledge of ServiceNow platform capabilities and architecture.
- Experience with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and other web technologies.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- ServiceNow Certified Application Developer certification.
- Experience in Agile development methodologies.

**Job Title: Senior Software QA Engineer**

**Location:** Lahore

**Company:** DESCON

**Salary:** Competitive

**Application Deadline:** 31 March 2025

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Software QA Engineer to join our dynamic team in Lahore. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in quality assurance within the AI industry, ensuring that our software products meet the highest standards of quality and compliance.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Develop and implement comprehensive test plans and test cases for AI software applications.

Here's a tailored job description for the Backend Developer position at DESCON:

**Job Title: Backend Developer (Node.js & Nest.js Expert)**  
**Location: Lahore (with potential for change based on company requirements)**  
**Salary Range: 430,000 PKR**  
**Application Deadline: 30 March 2025**

**Company Overview:**  
DESCON is a leading company in [Industry/Field], committed to delivering innovative solutions and services. We are seeking a highly skilled Backend Developer to join our dynamic team and contribute to our cutting-edge projects.

**Job Description:**  
As a Backend Developer at DESCON, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining robust backend APIs, including RESTful services, using Node.js and Nest.js. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration and functionality of our applications.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Develop and maintain scalable backend APIs using Node.js and Nest.js.
- Collaborate with front-end developers and other team members to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
- Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
- Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems.
- Implement security and data protection measures.
- Stay updated with emerging technologies and apply them to improve existing solutions.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Master's degree in Software Engineering or related field.
- Over 5 years of industry experience in backend development.
- Expertise in Node.js and Nest.js frameworks.
- Strong understanding of RESTful API design and development.
- Familiarity with database technologies such as MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Strong communication and teamwork abilities.

**Certifications:**

- Relevant expert-level certifications in Node.js and Nest.js are highly desirable.

**How to Apply:**  
Interested candidates are encouraged to submit their applications by the deadline of 30 March 2025.

**Job Title:** Senior HR Manager  
**Location:** Lahore  
**Salary Range:** PKR 200,000 - 300,000  

**Company:** DESCON  

**Application Deadline:** 25 March 2025  

**Job Description:**  
DESCON is seeking a highly experienced Senior HR Manager to lead our talent acquisition efforts, particularly focusing on hiring tech experts. The ideal candidate will possess a strategic mindset, exceptional leadership skills, and a deep understanding of the technology sector's hiring landscape.

**Key Responsibilities:**  
- Develop and implement effective recruitment strategies to attract top tech talent.
- Lead the full recruitment cycle, from job posting to onboarding, ensuring a seamless candidate experience.
- Collaborate with department heads to understand hiring needs and align recruitment strategies accordingly.
- Manage and mentor the HR team, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and professional development.
- Ensure compliance with labor laws and regulations, maintaining up-to-date knowledge of industry standards.
- Utilize data-driven insights to refine recruitment processes and improve hiring outcomes.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**  
- Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
- SHRM-CP or PHR certification is required.
- Minimum of 7 years of HR experience, with at least 3 years in a senior management role.
- Proven track record of successfully hiring tech experts.
- Strong understanding of labor laws and regulatory compliance.
- Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
- Proficiency in HR software and applicant tracking systems.

**Preferred Qualifications:**  
- Master's degree in Human Resources or a related field.
- Experience in a technology-focused company.

**Job Title: School Teacher**

**Location:** Lahore

**Company:** DESCON

**Application Deadline:** 12 March 2025

**Salary Range:** PKR 200,000 to PKR 400,000

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a dedicated and passionate School Teacher to join our educational team in Lahore. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating a nurturing and stimulating learning environment for students, fostering both academic and personal growth.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Develop and implement engaging lesson plans that meet curriculum standards.
- Assess and evaluate student progress and provide constructive feedback.
- Foster a positive classroom environment that encourages student participation and collaboration.
- Utilize a variety of teaching methods to accommodate different learning styles.
- Maintain open communication with parents and guardians regarding student performance.
- Participate in professional development opportunities to enhance teaching skills.
- Collaborate with colleagues to improve educational programs and outcomes.

**Qualifications:**

- Bachelor's degree in Education or a related field.
- Valid teaching certification or credential.
- Proven experience in teaching at the specified grade level or subject area.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
- Ability to inspire and motivate students.
- Familiarity with educational technology and software.

**Preferred Skills:**

- Experience with curriculum development and classroom management.
- Knowledge of child development and learning theories.
- Ability to adapt teaching methods to meet diverse student needs.

**Job Title: Senior Business Developer - Software Development**

**Location:** Lahore

**Company:** DESCON

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a dynamic and experienced Senior Business Developer to join our software development team. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in client acquisition and business growth on a global scale. This role requires strategic thinking, leadership, and a deep understanding of the software development market.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Develop and implement strategic business development plans to achieve company growth objectives in the software development sector.
- Identify and pursue new business opportunities worldwide, focusing on expanding DESCON's client base.

- Stay updated with industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities to inform business strategies.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field. A Master's degree is preferred.
- Proven experience in business development within the software development industry, with a focus on international markets.
- Strong certification in client hunting and acquisition strategies.
- Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
- Ability to work independently and lead a team towards achieving business goals.
- Proficiency in CRM software and other business development tools.

**Certifications:**

- Certification in Client Hunting is required.

Here's a tailored job description for the Senior UI Designer position at DESCON:

---

**Job Title: Senior UI Designer**

**Location:** Lahore

**Salary Range:** PKR 310,000 - 420,000

**Application Deadline:** 28 March 2025

**Company Overview:**
DESCON is a leading company in the construction industry, committed to delivering innovative and high-quality projects. We are seeking a talented and experienced Senior UI Designer to join our dynamic team and contribute to our construction-related projects.

**Job Description:**
As a Senior UI Designer at DESCON, you will play a crucial role in designing user interfaces that enhance the user experience for our construction projects. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to create visually appealing and user-friendly designs that align with our brand and project goals.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Design and develop intuitive and engaging user interfaces for construction-related applications and platforms.
- Collaborate with project managers, developers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and translate them into design solutions.
- Conduct user research and usability testing to gather insights and improve design decisions.
- Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups using industry-standard design tools.
- Ensure consistency and adherence to design guidelines and best practices across all projects.
- Stay updated with the latest design trends and technologies to continuously improve design processes and deliverables.
- Mentor and guide junior designers, providing feedback and support to foster their professional growth.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, or a related field.
- Proven experience as a UI Designer, preferably in the construction industry or related fields.
- Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, Figma, or similar.
- Strong understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
- Designing specific certifications are a plus.

**Why Join DESCON:**

- Opportunity to work on exciting and innovative construction projects.
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Collaborative and inclusive work environment.
- Professional growth and development opportunities.

Here's a tailored job description for the Business Developer position in the healthcare sector at DESCON:

**Job Title: Senior Business Developer - Healthcare**

**Location:** Islamabad

**Salary Range:** PKR 300,000 to 490,000

**Application Deadline:** 20 March 2025

**Company:** DESCON

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Business Developer to join our dynamic team in the healthcare sector. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in healthcare management and a deep understanding of HIPAA compliance. This role is pivotal in driving business growth and expanding our market presence.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Develop and implement strategic business plans to achieve company goals and objectives.
- Identify and pursue new business opportunities within the healthcare sector.
- Build and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders, including healthcare providers, regulatory bodies, and industry partners.
- Conduct market research and analysis to identify trends and opportunities for growth.
- Ensure compliance with HIPAA and other relevant healthcare regulations.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop innovative solutions and proposals for clients.
- Prepare and deliver compelling presentations and proposals to potential clients and partners.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Proven leadership and project management abilities.
- Proficiency in process simulation software and other relevant engineering tools.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

**Job Title: Senior AI Engineer**

**Location:** Lahore, Pakistan

**Company:** DESCON

**Salary Range:** PKR 100,000 to PKR 150,000

**Application Deadline:** 18 February 2025

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior AI Engineer to join our team in Lahore. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Generative AI and will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing advanced AI models and algorithms to solve complex problems and drive innovation within our organization.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Lead the development and deployment of AI models and algorithms focused on Generative AI applications.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into existing products and services.
- Conduct research and stay updated on the latest advancements in AI technologies and methodologies.
- Ensure compliance with relevant data privacy regulations and industry standards.
- Mentor and guide junior AI engineers and data scientists.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Master's degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field.
- Proven experience in AI and machine learning, with a focus on Generative AI.
- Strong programming skills in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar frameworks.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently and collaboratively.
- Relevant certifications in AI or machine learning are highly desirable.

**Preferred Certifications:**

- Certified Artificial Intelligence Practitioner (CAIP)
- TensorFlow Developer Certificate

Join DESCON and be a part of a dynamic team that is at the forefront of AI innovation. We offer a competitive salary, professional growth opportunities, and a collaborative work environment.

**Job Title: UI/UX Designer**

**Location:** Lahore

**Salary Range:** 8,500 - 120,000

**Application Deadline:** 31 March

**Company:** DESCON

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a creative and detail-oriented UI/UX Designer to join our dynamic team in the software industry. The ideal candidate will have a strong passion for designing intuitive and engaging user experiences, primarily using Figma. This mid-level position requires a blend of creativity, technical expertise, and a user-centered design approach.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Collaborate with product managers and developers to create user-friendly interfaces for web and mobile applications.
- Design wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups using Figma.
- Conduct user research and usability testing to gather feedback and iterate on design solutions.
- Ensure design consistency and alignment with brand guidelines across all platforms.
- Stay updated with the latest UI/UX trends and best practices to enhance user experience.
- Communicate design ideas and prototypes to stakeholders effectively.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer in the software industry.
- Proficiency in Figma and other design tools.
- Strong portfolio showcasing design projects and problem-solving skills.
- Excellent understanding of user-centered design principles.
- Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
- Strong communication and presentation skills.

---

This job description was crafted based on your input, focusing on the software industry, proficiency in Figma, and a mid-level experience requirement. DESCON is seeking a talented and motivated Software Engineer specializing in web development to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in JavaScript and proficiency in React, contributing to the development of innovative web applications.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Job Description:**

DESCON is seeking a dynamic and motivated Sales Associate to join our retail apparel team in Lahore. As a mid-level Sales Associate, you will play a crucial role in driving sales and providing exceptional customer service.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Achieve and exceed monthly sales targets by engaging with customers and promoting our apparel products.
- Provide excellent customer service by understanding customer needs and offering suitable product recommendations.
- Maintain a clean and organized sales floor to enhance the shopping experience.
- Assist in inventory management, including stock replenishment and product displays.
- Stay updated on the latest fashion trends and product knowledge to effectively assist customers.
- Collaborate with the sales team to develop strategies for increasing sales and customer satisfaction.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Mid-level experience in retail sales, preferably in the apparel sector.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple tasks.
- Sales certifications are beneficial.
- Proficiency in using point-of-sale (POS) systems and inventory management software.

**Salary Range:** [To be determined]

**Job Title: Mid-Level Software Engineer (Web Development)**  
**Company: DESCON**  
**Location: [Pending]**  
**Application Deadline: [Pending]**

**Job Description:**  
DESCON is seeking a talented and motivated Mid-Level Software Engineer with a focus on web development to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in JavaScript and a passion for creating innovative web applications.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Develop, test, and maintain web applications using JavaScript and related technologies.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
- Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
- Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
- Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
- Proven experience in web development with a strong focus on JavaScript.
- Familiarity with modern JavaScript frameworks such as React or Angular is a plus.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.

**Salary Range:** $50,000 - $90,000
